caption:
Sometimes, friendships naturally fade, not because of conflict, but because we’re growing in ways that no longer align. ⁠
⁠
Letting go doesn’t mean there’s bad blood—it’s part of honoring your own path and theirs. ⁠
⁠
In "How to Stop Breaking Your Own Heart" I explore how to navigate these shifts with grace and acceptance. Not everyone is meant to stay in your life forever, and that’s okay. ⁠
⁠
If this resonates with you, grab a copy on Amazon and dive deeper into this journey. 🌻
